title: RevereSport Waterproof iPhone Pro Max 14/13/12/Plus Running Armband with Extra Pockets for Keys, Cash and Credit Cards. Phone Arm Holder for Sports, Gym Workouts and Exercise
features: DESIGNED FOR YOUR IPHONE MAX & PLUS : The lightweight arm band is designed to hold your iPhone Pro Max & Plus 14/13/12 (Not Mini/Pro). Listen to music, take calls and track your fitness, without the inconvenience of removing your smartphone.

PROTECTS YOUR PHONE : The NEW advanced Lycra material has a waterproof coating, so it will block water from getting to your phone. Run in the rain or sweat hard in the gym knowing your phone is protected. (Not for Submerging/Swimming)

SMALL - LARGE ARMS : Whatever your arm size, the phone holder is secure and will not fall down during exercise. The adjustable armband comes with a bonus extender strap included, perfect to fit all arm circumferences: SMALL 9" - LARGE 17.5" inches

CARRY YOUR VALUABLES : Train anytime, anywhere. The extra bright reflector strip gives you high visibility when running at night. The new Larger key pocket is perfect for keeping your house key and car key / fob secure. There is also a handy pocket perfect for carrying Cash, Credit Cards and ID.

LIFETIME WARRANTY - Here are RevereSport we care about our customers and we only provide the finest quality sports armbands. Feel secure when you purchase knowing you are covered by our 60-Day money back Guarantee and our LIFETIME replacement Guarantee
description: DESIGNED FOR YOUR IPHONE PRO MAX & PLUS !!!

This is the most secure armband on the market, designed to hold your phone so you don't even notice you have it with you. The lightweight material creates a snug No Bounce extra secure fit!! The running armband will hold your phone securely allowing you to access apps, listen to music and train with no distractions

WATER PROTECTION: Run in the rain and sweat hard in the gym knowing your phone is protected. (Not for Submerging/Swimming) UN-RESTRICTED ACCESS: Skip your music and check your messages without the inconvenience of removing your phone. SUPER GRIP: The Lycra material is soft and will Not Ride up when you train NIGHT REFLECTOR: Bright reflectors to give you high visibility  KEY POCKET: New larger key pocket to hold all key sizes including car keys / fobs  CASH / CARD POCKET: Extra pocket to hold cash, credit cards and IDs MUSIC ON THE GO: Easy access headphone ports
iPhone 14 Pro Max / 14 Plus (Not Mini/Pro)  iPhone 13 Pro Max (Not Mini/Pro)  iPhone 12 Pro Max (Not Mini/Pro)
'SLIM' CASE ONLY (NOT suitable for large cases i.e. Otterbox Defender / Lifeproof)
60-Day Money Back GUARANTEE  Lifetime Replacement GUARANTEE
